author: rwhitcomb
msg: Adding a FillPane component that acts somewhat like a BoxPane in that
it lays out its children along one axis or the other, but unlike
BoxPane it always fills up the available space from its parent and
distributes the space evenly among its children (in both directions).
Also adding a new FillPaneListener that is called for changes in
New skin for this component as well, pretty much the same as BoxPane
except it doesn't support the 'fill' style because it always fills.
